commit message: first commit
Added files.
Finished adding data objects.

Worked on v. 9 database updated and re-doing welcome_activity - both
need further work.

Added preferences, fixed welcome activity, background image setting
added.
Improved error handling for failure to select picture.
Database upgrade and project listings should now work.
Project creation now works.
Missing settings start from new project activity added.
Updated version.
Much database refactoring.
OMG, counting works!
Changed list background.

Better background image management, decent (but more bloated) count
widget layout.
Project deletion working (long press in list).
Multiple alerts per count now working.
Finished counting activity setup.
Fixed crash caused by null project.notes.
CountOptionsActivity starts but layout needs work.

Layout changes, using BeeCountActivity to pass project_id to
CountingActivity.

Landscape/large layouts now worked, various fixes added to
CountOptionsActivity.
CountOptionsActivity now works!
Layout improvements, fixed alert saving bug.
Modified .gitignore.

Database export/import added back in, can create project from list
activity.

Widget refactoring, can now edit project title and notes, background
image causing crashes.
Attempt to fix memory problems.

Counts can be added, deleted and re-named. CountOptionsActivity will now
only save if the save button is pressed.
Some layout changes for a presentation screenshot.
Layout of linking widget sorted.
Further linking widget improvements.
Comment fix.
It looks like links can now be created.
Links can now be deleted as well.
Tablet layout for editing complete.
Fix for layout on Nexus 7 and background image on Galaxy Nexus.
Some lint cleanup. More to do later.
Added wakelock in counting activity.
Improved icon.
Crashing bug fixed.
Ready for release.
Fixed hint text in count edit widget.
